fields.name: Spelling mistake correction
fields.description: Correct the spelling mistakes in the following sentence

fields.question: I heard about the complain of Nexus S lack of 720p video recording?
how does that compared to Samsung Galaxy S?
I have two android tablet device, and I want to use the first device to control the second device.

day or two ago I have troubles in default Market Application, When I try to scroll in selection "Just In" application just stop working and I get screen black for while and after that I get error process com.android.vending is crashed.
can,i uninstall default applications that comes with android os.
if you have more than 1 browser and you haven't set a dfault, Android will assk you which one to choose.
as Seth and Hcpl have said VLC Player can play almost any format ad should be able to play your videos.

if you want to know what codec is being used, then try opening the video in a codec identifying app like GSpot, this should tell you exactly which audio and video foprmats and codecs are in your videos.
odly, some it left off randomly.
